name: McCubeClap's Adventures
description:
Well done! With the download of this game, you will receive your very own "McCubeClap" Robot! Unfortunately he is bound to the game, but that shouldn't be a problem. Just guide him through the levels and have some fun, with your very own robot!

But be careful, its just the Version 1 prototype... he might sometimes not function as expected or written in the manual. In that case... just try pressing some buttons, or spin your mouse wheel, maybe it works!

This game was made for the GMTK Jam 2020 and the IFgameSH Summer Jam 2020.

Made by:

Linus Timm - Programming 

Lara Teegen - Art

Patrik Pleger - Level Design
